title: SELF TAPPING SPRAY NOZZLE FOR VEHICLE VENTILATION SYSTEM
abstract: A self tapping spray nozzle (10) for use in a vehicle ventilation system is preferably made of stainless steel. The spray nozzle has a neck (12) with an internal channel (34) and threads (17) cut into its outside surface. A wedge at a thirty degree angle, having sharpened edges is at the top of the neck. At least one port (14, 15) extends from the channel to the outside surface of the neck. A collar (13) with a plurality of sides (19) encompasses the circumference of the neck at its bottom. One side of the collar is aligned with the port to help align the port in a desired direction.

motivations: There is a need for an improved spray nozzle design for vehicle ventilation systems that can be easily installed and aligned.
objectives: Design a self-tapping spray nozzle that can be efficiently integrated into vehicle ventilation systems.
methods: Develop a spray nozzle with a threaded neck and internal channel, featuring at least one port for airflow.
Incorporate a wedge with sharpened edges at the top of the neck for self-tapping functionality.
Include a collar with multiple sides to facilitate alignment of the port in the desired direction.
results: Provide an effective and easy-to-install spray nozzle solution for vehicle ventilation systems.
llama_json.research_subject: Design of a self-tapping spray nozzle for vehicle ventilation systems

motivations: There is a need for an efficient spray nozzle for use in vehicle ventilation systems.
objectives: Design a self-tapping spray nozzle made of stainless steel for use in vehicle ventilation systems.
methods: The spray nozzle is designed with a neck having an internal channel and threads cut into its outside surface.
A wedge with sharpened edges is placed at the top of the neck.
At least one port extends from the channel to the outside surface of the neck, and a collar with multiple sides encompasses the neck's circumference at its bottom.
results: The spray nozzle can be easily installed in a vehicle ventilation system and aligned in a desired direction.
openai_json.research_subject: Design of a self-tapping spray nozzle for vehicle ventilation systems

motivations: There is a need for improved spray nozzle designs in vehicle ventilation systems that can be easily installed and properly aligned.
objectives: Design and develop a self-tapping spray nozzle for vehicle ventilation systems that enables easy installation and precise directional alignment.
methods: Construct the nozzle from stainless steel with a threaded neck design and a wedge-shaped top with sharpened edges for self-tapping capability.
Incorporate internal channels and ports for fluid flow, with a multi-sided collar for alignment purposes.
results: The design enables self-tapping installation into vehicle ventilation systems with improved alignment control through the collar mechanism.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Self-tapping spray nozzle design for vehicle ventilation systems
